name: WorkFlowy [minimalistic mix: simple, clear, roomy]
description:
simple header: no wf text logo anymore.
clear picture: no visible page boundaries, ads or slogans: everything's clean.
bullet space is 4px: line breaks distance is little more spacious. (you can change it manually in two clicks, just search '4px' via edit CSS).
wideness is adaptable.
additional_info:
Feel free to improve this theme way you like and post. But you better not call in minimalistic if you're going to stuff something extra in it )

I made this theme to make it work perfect for myself and tested it for a months. 
It is based on this theme mostly on the 2 existing themes:
